result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.

Attys to set sentencing date;

Adj: 11:30 am

Clerk: Britney 
Case Called: 9:06 a.m. 
**Includes 15CF233, 15CF284 & 15CF376**
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo. Defendant appears in custody with Attorney Amanda Skorr. Date & time for Preliminary Hearing in 15CF376 only, 15CF233 & 15CF284 are tracking. 
Waiver of Prelim. filed. Court questions deft as to waiver. Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed.  Reading Waived.
Plea: NOT GUILTY
Dates to be set with JA following court. 
Bond is continued. 
Adj: 9:08 a.m.
Status conference on April 29, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Clerk: Britney 
Case Called: 3:25 p.m. 
**Includes 15CF233 & 15CF284**
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo. Defendant appears in custody with Attorney Amanda Skorr. Date & time set for Preliminary Hearing in 15CF284 and Arraignment in 15CF233 & 15CF284. Defendant wishes to proceed with Waiver of Preliminary Hearing in 15CF284.
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
COURT proceeds with Arraignment in both files. 
Information previously filed in 15CF233. Reading Waived. Information to be filed in 15CF284 tomorrow- 04/14/15. 
Plea: NOT GUILTY
Future dates to be set with JA following court. 
Attorney Skorr requests modification of bond to remove the no contact with K.H.
State objects any bond modification. 
COURT denies bond modification at this time. 
Adj: 3:29 p.m.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Includes 15CF284 and 15CF233.  Absolute sobriety. Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202-drugs for Day report.  No contact with  A.E.& K.H. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.   Defendant shall not possess any dangerous weapons during the pendency of this action.
